description: Try our easy to follow Beef & Sweet Potato Bake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Beef & Sweet Potato Bake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C. Spread 1 cup mince mixture into the base of a 12-cup baking dish. Top with a layer of sweet potato, overlapping slightly. Drizzle with cheese sauce. Cover with half the remaining mince, sweet potato, cheese sauce, then remaining mince and lastly sweet potato. Spread remaining cheese sauce over top of layers and sprinkle with remaining tasty cheese and parmesan. Bake for 35 minutes or until golden. Stand for 10 minutes before cutting into pieces.
